unnormalised: Borem, tumkam loan zai asa? Kamar kasunchea, bhayo ani behno, kiteak hi ek bhayanak safar, Lonavala laginchya ghat roddanchea porosui unch! Loan gheunk Chandni Chowkant Diwali vellar ek boro parking spot sodcheak sodche sarke - asambhav, tanavacho ani tumi suruwatik itlo upeksit keli porosui tumi odik diunk poddtalem.
normalised: Boro, tumka loan zai? Tolak bandhat, bhau ani bhainino, kiteak hem ek ranvtonnuki zhuz, Lonavala laginchya ghat rastyapeksa khadde chodon asa! Loan surakshit korop mhollear Diwali vellar Chandni Chowkant ek boro parking spot sodunk prayatn korop â€“ sambhavna na, tanavachi, ani tumi suruvatila yevjit kellya peksha tumi chod pay korchi podta.

unnormalised: Poilem, tumkam sarkari junglantlean vachunk poddtalem. Tem sorkarachem ek escape roomachem rup manun gheiat, punn mojjeche puzzles bodlek, tumkam forms mellttat. Kiteak. Kitlim tori. Forms. Tumkam tumchem PAN card, Aadhar card, voter ID, tumchea ajji-panajichem zolmachem pramanptr ani sambhavtat tumi ek khorem vyakti mhunn sidh korcheak raktacho namuno zai poddtta ani konnichi tari AI bot na ji systemak haraunk sodta. Dor eka kagodpotrak gazetted officeran pass korunk zai, jem, sach sangunk zaitar, ek fantashi kadambari bhaxen dista.
normalised: Poilem, tumka adhikari tantrantlean vatonk podto. Taka sarkari escape roomachi rupnni dhi, poinn jevnnache kodde sodpache suvater, tumka forms mellttat. Kitle. Form. Tumka tumcho P-A-N card, Aadhar card, voter I-D, tumchea azjekarleachem janmache patrak ani sambhavit ek rogtacho namuno zai podtalo tumi ek khoreli vyakti mhonn sabit korunk ani konn A-I bot hem systemak harovnk prayatn korun na. Ek gazetted adhikaryakoddlean dor ek kagot patrail'lea uprantuch teamanikodden to manincho asa, jem dekhunk ek fantasy novelatil vaportale.

unnormalised: Ani magir interest rate asa. Tumkam advertisement dista je "Attractive rates suruwatik fokot 7.5%!" mhunta. Aascharya dislem, haina? Fokot yad dovrat, "suruwatik" hacho mukhel vakyo asa. Tumchea process korpache fees, lipoil'lea charges ani loan officerachem compound interest ek avaghad flowchart vaporun somzavniche utsavana velar tumi 14.5% diunk lagtale. Tem sanglearui zata ki tumi tumchem chai-samosache budget aaglechea 5 varsank diunk sodtat.
normalised: Ani magir vaddi darr asa. Tumi dekhata jaheerat, jem bhas dita "karkashh darr tin sat point panch takke pasun suru zatat!" Khoresh zalem, kithe? Fokol yaad dovrat, "suru zatat" him mukhel vakye asa. Tumchea processingeche kharche, lipoyil'le kharche, ani loan odhikaryachen sangtolo compound vaddi ek kathin flowchart vaprun, tumi chod korun chaudah point panch takke divonk lagtole. Tem ek sarkem asta ani tumche chai-samosache yevzonk panch vorsank sangta.

unnormalised: Ani tumkam collateral vixim uloitelem mhunn sangunk naka. Tankam kitem tori voddlem zai. Tumchem kutumbachem ghor? Tumchi bhov molachi vintage scooter? Tumchem Bollywood movie posteranchem collection? Banks tea karkhana owner bhaxen aasat, "arre bhai, guarantee tori zai". Tumchea sonachea dagineank vaporunk sodtale zalear, ek thoravik mulya nirharan tayar zata. Tem dor eka bangle ani necklaceak forensic scientist bhaxen nitallait, sambhavtat te ashilem mhuntat "He 22K asa vo fokot sonachi plate asa?" Tumi therea bosun astale ani asa kartale te tumchi kanachi bali dekhun divchonam ji tumi tumchea cousinchea lognak nachtana tem vallayle.
normalised: Ani tumi collateralacher suru zhauka di nakat. Tankam kashtavachi vostu zai. Tumchea gharchi vostu? Tumchem vinod scooter? Tumche Bollywood movie postersanche sango? Bank hi karyakaranachi rupnni bhaxen asa, "arre bhai, guarantee zai." Tumchea soneache daginyancho vapar korunk yevjit karthai zalear, ek thoravi shikshak tyaar zaat. Te dor ek bangle ani necklace eka forensic scientist kitle intensidade vaprun parakhtole, sambhavit mhantole, "hem twenty two K hai ki fakat gold-plated?" Tumi tya bosun astaole, ashankartaole ki teamaka ek earring tumchea cousin-chea lagachea nachchea vellar bent zalea disunk diun nako.

unnormalised: Atam, repaymentacher uloya. EMI. Eka bhayanak saman mahinyachi kisht. Ho jivo tumcho saye bhaxen patlaag kartale, tumchea dukhanchyano dukhan bhartale. Hem tea tras divche samdhenchya porosui vait ji sadharponn kutumbachea yektritak bhet ditat, punn dor jalebi khavpak bodlek, tumchem poket martat. Ani devak naak zai kitumi ek EMI payment chuklean. Derinchea fees Kolkatachea koneacher kachryachea porosui odik zalear Durga Pujache vellar.
normalised: Atam, aami repayments vixim uloita. E-M-I. Ek sarkhem mahinyachem instalment. Hem lanvhem pran tumchem saayen tumchem patlag koritolo, tumkam dar mahinyak tumche arthik tanache yaad korun diitolo. Tem ek tikhkallem kuttumbacho vyakti mhonn dekhun asa, jem family gatheringsak aamantranche bhair zata, poinn jevnnache suvater te tumche pagar khaata. Ani Devank bhevdhan tumi ek E-M-I divache bhuliat. Uktiche kharche tumchea Kolkata vhoddla gaddyer Durga Pujechea vellar chitrun aalta.

unnormalised: Ani magir pre-paymentache dand asatat. Tumkam kaman bonus melltta? Tumi sangtale, "Borem asa, hanv loan diun bhortam!" Na. Bank tumkam pre-payment dand martale, kiteak tanchi dukh zaleli asa kitumi tankam poixe poilim divpak sodtale mhunnun. Hem ashem dislem ki te mhuntaat, "Kashi tumi tumcheach financeache ghulamiponache systemantle bhair vetale!" Gombhirtayen, kitem tori tumi vichartale zalear te tumkam loan bhorenn korun sokall karuncha kitumi tumkam ek-ek rupiak milk korunk mellcho.
normalised: Ani magir pre-payment jurnama asa. Tumka kaamacher bonus mellta? Tumi vichartaole, "bhau borem, mi eka loan divnk zata!" Na. Bank tumka pre-payment jurnama maritoli, kiteakan ditta tumi tankam poiso zoddunk prayatn karthai mhonn tem dukhi zata. Te mhantolleta bhaxen asta, "kiti zor tumi amchea thoravillea arthik shaktiche systemantlean bhair sodunk prayatn karthai!" Khoresh mhantole zalear tumi kashtaolta ki te loans divnk kashtav ditha, jevn te tumak dar rupeank kadunk shakhi dhara.

unnormalised: Tem ashem asa. Hindustanan loan gheunk ek adventure, ek kadambari, ek thoravik Bollywood drama, dukhani, uttejanani ani kanchak asantoshk pavche shevottak. Fokot yad dovrat ek magnifiying classan bhov bariken vazunk, lakh vakya vicharunk (ji murkh dista tantuntlem) ani sambhavtat tumche bhov molache vostu Olxacher vikun ek loan bhorta. Ani kamach tem tumchi maan, tumchem kutumbachem ghor ani tumchi shaanti bhair veteli. Sambhavtat. Punn atam, tumkam ek kharch korcheak boro chai ani pakoryam zaitar.
normalised: Boro, tumche pasun tyaa asa. Bharatant loan mellovnk ek aventura, ek khatha, ek purn Bollywood drama dukham, asha-nirasha ani ek thodde asantoshjanak sampka. Fokol yaad dovrat fine print vachat (magnifying glass vaprun, chod korun), lakh questions vicharat (tevui je khodde dishtat), ani sambhavit tumchea prize-jitley vostu Olxacher vikun, loan divncho prayatn karchek poile. Komit tumi tumchem shanti, tumchem ghari, ani tumchem manachi shanti thambaitolo. Sambhavit. Poinn hey, komit tumka thodde chai ani pakoras khatir voddlea rupea asalole!
